context: I like Greg Bear, what else has he written?
Great choice, Bear has also written The Time Machine, and The Forge of God. Have you read those yet?
No yet, didn't H.G Wells also write something called The Time Machine?
resp: That is right! Wells released a book called The Time Machine in 1895 with the genre Children's Literature/Time Travel.
